attributes.name: Academic
attributes.description: Gain 2 focus when reading. Gain two free titles in the knowledge tree

attributes.name: Acute Senses
attributes.description: Add a d6 when making perception checks

attributes.name: Attractiveness
attributes.description: Add 1 to all dice when making speech rolls with people who are attracted to you

attributes.name: Castigator
attributes.description: Add your total harm from your confidence

attributes.name: Dry Blooded
attributes.description: Add a negataive d6 to rune rolls you make and ones made against you

attributes.name: Dull Senses
attributes.description: Add two negative d6 when making perception checks

attributes.name: Dumb Luck
attributes.description: Lose 2 focus. You may add an additional attribute die to any roll once a day

attributes.name: Fast Reactions
attributes.description: Take two actions during enemies surprise rounds

attributes.name: Fearful
attributes.description: Subtract your total harm from your confidence

attributes.name: Fire Blooded
attributes.description: Add a d6 to rune rolls you make and ones made against you

attributes.name: Item
attributes.description: You start with a powerful item

attributes.name: Nerves of Steel
attributes.description: Twice per day, when you have lost confidence, don't

attributes.name: Pain Resistance
attributes.description: Use one die smaller for your harm die. For example, a 6 harm now rolls a d4

attributes.name: Silver Tongue
attributes.description: Gain 2 confidence on speech rolls with non-hostile characters

attributes.name: Slow Reactions
attributes.description: Add two negative d6 to your initiative dice pool

attributes.name: Steel Gaze
attributes.description: Gain 2 confidence on speech rolls with hostile characters
